name: Nepal
interesting_fact: Nepal is home to Mount Everest, the highest peak in the world.

name: Japan
interesting_fact: Japan has more than 6,800 islands, with Honshu being the largest.

name: Canada
interesting_fact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: Australia
interesting_fact: Australia is the only country that is also a continent.

name: Brazil
interesting_fact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, the largest rainforest in the world.

name: Germany
interesting_fact: Germany is known for its Autobahn, which has some sections with no speed limits.

name: South Africa
interesting_fact: South Africa has three capital cities, each serving a different function.

name: India
interesting_fact: India is the world's largest democracy with over 1.4 billion people.
